::Killfest/EndBringer/Liono/Koj::

Killfest nods, watching Koj approaching. Before the Maximal got to 
Killfest, the missiles hit, sending Koj flipping over Killfest's head 
and flying toward EndBringer, who had his tentacles ready.

EndBringer lashes out with a tentacle, but Koj reacts quickly by 
cutting it off with his sword, an electric shock traveling up the 
sword and into Koj, distracting him. A missile from Killfest smashes 
into his back, sending him flying over EndBringer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Liono flies back, the sword leaving a gash on his chest. He draws his 
own sword, holding it in front of him. "We'll see who's better, 
Decepticon," he says, slashing at Motormaster.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster takes the brunt of the shots being fired at him as they
> ricochet of his armored hull, and maneuvers himself towards Liono, 
drawing
> his sword. He turns to Killfest, and over his comlink speaks "we 
need to
> get in there to check what is going on, we will let Astroblast 
check it
> out, we'll keep them busy. He then turns to Liono, "Now Maximal, 
feel the
> anger of a Decepticon, and he swings towards his enemy. As he move 
he
> silently on a different frequency from everyone, so no one else  
could
> normally hear it (unless they intercept) "Astroblast, I will keep 
them
> busy, get on the ark and find our target. If it's not there look 
through
> Teletran's datatracks to find it."
